name: Velleine
description:
Velleine is a roguelike game prototype made by the LockDownLads. Kill the enemies and collect coins to buy more health, weapons, and upgrades, then jump back to a harder level. This prototype consist of one level and one item in the shop, there will be action for sure.

CONTROLS 

WASD-move
Mouse-Shoot

The game is our first and made with GameMaker 2
